DOC.brief_title: High Protein Intake Decrease Emesis Promote Patient Satisfaction Labor
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator plan enroll woman ( n=150 ) request epidural anesthesia labor . After placement labor epidural catheter , parturients randomize computer generate number table one two group . Group P - high protein drink 30 gram protein ice chip PRN , Group C - control group consist ice chip PRN . The protein drink use Premier Nutrition Protein Shake , contain 30 gram protein 11 ounce . Measured variable include ; nausea emesis epidural placement , hourly interval delivery , 1 hour post delivery . Nausea evaluate use visual analog scale ( VAS ) ; 0 = nausea 10 = bad nausea ever . Episodes emesis record ( yes/no ) . The parturient see day follow delivery evaluate overall patient satisfaction . Parturients rate satisfaction level use scale 0-100 0=not satisfy 100=very satisfied . The investigator believe incidence emesis decrease parturients receive high protein intake labor , overall patient satisfaction increase .
DOC.criteria: All woman childbearing age request labor epidural analgesia , â‰¤ 5cm cervical dilatation time epidural insertion , > 36 week gestation , singleton pregnancy , vertex presentation , NPO 4 hour prior epidural insertion . Both nulliparous multiparous woman include . Minors age 18 year include separate inform consent present individual . Women diabetes ( increase risk gastroparesis fetal macrosomia ) , multiple gestation , nonvertex fetal presentation , chronic opioid use ( delay gastric empty ) , history gastric bypass surgery ( abnormal anatomical stomach ) , severe morbid obesity ( BMI > 40kg/m2 due increase intragastric pressure ) , history know obstetric medical complication ( i.e . preeclampsia ) may increase likelihood complicate operative delivery ( i.e . cesarean section ) .
